forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 16 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 12 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the day emerges under a bright, sunny sky, tempered by a crisp west-southwest breeze that dances through the streets with an invigorating energy. The forecast offers a high near 65, before the gentle decline towards the late afternoon settles around 62. This weather carries with it the richness of a quintessential San Francisco day, where the sunlight plays off the iconic architecture, casting intricate shadows and inviting residents outdoors.

As the sun climbs higher, the air remains relatively clear, though hints of the marine layer linger, nudging at the edges of visibility around the Golden Gate. The blend creates a harmonious atmosphere, perfect for wandering along the Embarcadero or finding a quiet spot in one of the city’s many parks. Comfortable layers are recommended; a light jacket would offer solace as the wind picks up, especially as evening approaches, when temperatures dip to around 54. As the city transitions into night, the partly cloudy sky will likely deepen the colors of the sunset, offering a fitting end to the day’s charms. For those looking to explore or simply take a leisurely stroll, this lovely weather presents an ideal backdrop for enjoying the enduring beauty of San Francisco.
